p: In terms of individual polyphenols, phenolic acids were determined such as: gallic acid (GA), protocatechuic acid (PR), caffeic acid (CA), coumaric acid (CU), ferulic acid (FE), and rosmarinic acid (RO); we also determined the content in several flavonoids, such as: epicatechin (EC), rutin (RU), resveratrol (RS), quercitin (QU) and kaempherol (KP); the values of polyphenolic content varied according to the analyzed matrix ( Table 3).
